message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted with exceptional quality. This product is not just an item; it's a symbol of excellence and functionality. Given its unique features and the care put into its creation, we believe it's worth more than $100. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I kindly propose a special introductory price of $120 for you. This is an exclusive opportunity to own something truly remarkable at a fantastic value. I look forward to your response and the chance to enhance your experience with this product.
